oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relationship between the timing of seedbed preparation and the efficacy of pre-emergence flaming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vanhala, Petri
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The field experiments were conducted in 1995 and 1996. Seedbed preparation was done with a rotary tiller to 15-20 cm depth either 5-7 days prior to sowing of carrot or at the day of sowing. In both cases, flaming was done 8 days after sowing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vanhala, Petri (2002) Relationship between the timing of seedbed preparation and the efficacy of pre-emergence flaming. Paper at: 4th EWRS workshop on physical weed control, Elspeet, The Netherlands, 20-22 March 2000.
